meanings.definition: A type of ball used in the sport of rugby.
meanings.sent1: During the game, the players passed the rugbies to each other skillfully.
meanings.sent2: The coach brought a bag full of rugbies for the team practice.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog mistook the rugbies for chew toys and ran off with them.
meanings.sent4: The rugbies scattered across the field like colorful orbs of energy.
meanings.sent5: The shiny surface of the rugbies reflected the sunlight, making them sparkle.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'rugby', referring to the sport itself.
meanings.sent1: Fans cheered loudly as the teams played with the rugbies on the field.
meanings.sent2: The championship match featured intense competition with the rugbies.
meanings.sent3: The rugbies seemed to have a mind of their own, bouncing unpredictably.
meanings.sent4: In the heat of the game, the rugbies became symbols of determination and teamwork.
meanings.sent5: The history of the rugbies dates back to the origins of the sport itself.
